docs.snippet: France is preparing for its first World Cup match since leaving South Africa in disgrace four years ago following a player strike and a group-stage exit.
docs.lead_paragraph: France is preparing for its first World Cup match since leaving South Africa in disgrace four years ago following a player strike and a group-stage exit.

headline.main: France Has a Point to Prove; Messi Set for Action
headline.print_headline: France Has a Point to Prove; Messi Set for Action

docs.snippet: The skies may clear by Monday night, when the United States plays Ghana in the World Cup opener.
docs.lead_paragraph: The skies may clear by Monday night, when the United States plays Ghana in the World Cup opener.

headline.main: US Would Be Boosted With at Least Tie vs Ghana
headline.print_headline: US Would Be Boosted With at Least Tie vs Ghana

docs.snippet: Watching from the bench, Luis Suarez saw just how much his teammates miss him.
docs.lead_paragraph: Watching from the bench, Luis Suarez saw just how much his teammates miss him.

headline.main: Suarez Watches as Uruguay Stunned by Costa Rica
headline.print_headline: Suarez Watches as Uruguay Stunned by Costa Rica

docs.snippet: After falling behind 1-0, Costa Rica scores three goals to defeat Uruguay in one of the first upsets of the World Cup.
docs.abstract: After falling behind 1-0, Costa Rica scores three goals to defeat Uruguay in one of the first upsets of the World Cup.

headline.main: Uruguay vs. Costa Rica: Live Blog

docs.snippet: Colombia's emphatic 3-0 win over Greece on Saturday, hot on the heels of Chile's win over Australia, shows South American teams' World Cup ambitions do not stop at Brazil and Argentina.
docs.lead_paragraph: Colombia's emphatic 3-0 win over Greece on Saturday, hot on the heels of Chile's win over Australia, shows South American teams' World Cup ambitions do not stop at Brazil and Argentina.

headline.main: Colombia Signal South American World Cup Intent
headline.print_headline: Colombia Signal South American World Cup Intent

docs.snippet: The pressure is all on France to beat Honduras in their opening World Cup match on Sunday, and coach Didier Deschamps hopes his relatively inexperienced squad is mature enough to handle the expectations.
docs.lead_paragraph: The pressure is all on France to beat Honduras in their opening World Cup match on Sunday, and coach Didier Deschamps hopes his relatively inexperienced squad is mature enough to handle the expectations.

headline.main: Deschamps Hopes Young Squad Can Handle Pressure
headline.print_headline: Deschamps Hopes Young Squad Can Handle Pressure

docs.snippet: Costa Rica pulled off the biggest upset of the World Cup so far, scoring three second-half goals to come from behind and beat former champions Uruguay 3-1 in their opening Group D match on Saturday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Costa Rica pulled off the biggest upset of the World Cup so far, scoring three second-half goals to come from behind and beat former champions Uruguay 3-1 in their opening Group D match on Saturday.

headline.main: Clinical Costa Rica Fight Back to Stun Uruguay
headline.print_headline: Clinical Costa Rica Fight Back to Stun Uruguay

docs.snippet: Salvatore Sirigu will start in goal for Italy in the Group D match against England on Saturday after Gianluigi Buffon injured his ankle in training.
docs.lead_paragraph: Salvatore Sirigu will start in goal for Italy in the Group D match against England on Saturday after Gianluigi Buffon injured his ankle in training.

headline.main: Sirigu to Start in Goal for Italy Against England
